name: geomoment-angular
description: An angular module for date formatting; wraps geomoment. For use with browserify.

scripts.pretest: ./node_modules/.bin/coffee --bare --compile --output lib/ src/ && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/index.js > geomoment-angular.js && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs geomoment-angular.js > geomoment-angular.min.js

author: Max Edmands <git@maxedmands.com>
